mapper.insert: insert into bbs6 (bbs_num, bbs_name, bbs_pass, bbs_subject, bbs_content, bbs_file, bbs_re_ref, bbs_re_lev, bbs_re_seq, bbs_readcount, bbs_date, bbs_original) values(bbs6_num_seq.nextval,#{bbs_name},#{bbs_pass},#{bbs_subject}, #{bbs_content}, #{bbs_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bbs6_num_seq.nextval,0,0,0,sysdate, #{bbs_original, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, bbs_num, bbs_name, bbs_pass, bbs_subject, bbs_content, bbs_file, bbs_re_ref, bbs_re_lev, bbs_re_seq, bbs_readcount,bbs_date, bbs_original from (select * from bbs6 order by bbs_re_ref desc, bbs_re_seq asc) ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
